sentences.sentence: The 1946 “Portrait of the Artist in the Bathroom Mirror” is almost terrifyingly bleak.
sentences.translation: 1946年画的“Portrait of the Artist in the Bathroom Mirror（浴室镜里的艺术家肖像）”就流露出暗淡凄凉的基调。

sentences.sentence: Anyway, this residence stretches on an area of 1880 square meters which is terrifyingly huge.
sentences.translation: 无论如何，它的建筑，横跨1880年这是一个可怕的巨大平方米。

sentences.sentence: Estimates range from 2013-terrifyingly soon-to 2050 for the first year when the Arctic is free of ice in summer.
sentences.translation: 据推测，北极夏日无冰的开始年份，最早为急迫的2013年，最晚2050年。
